moreBlocks.articles:
• Wrongful Death
    At Brooks Law Group, our lawyers work closely with clients in difficult emotional times to fully recover what the law allows. We put our experience to work helping survivors and beneficiaries recover what they are due under the law.
  • Truck Accident Injuries
    At Brooks Law Group, we have experience and an impressive track record representing people who have suffered significant injuries in truck accidents.
  • Motorcycle Accident Injuries
    The only way to make sure that you get fair compensation for your motorcycle accident injury is for you to have an attorney who will fight for your rights. The attorneys at the Brooks Law Group will do just that.
  • Premises Liability
    Premises liability cases can be hard to prove, which is why it's important to work with an experienced attorney.
  • Social Security Disability
    Many Social Security Disability benefits applications are denied the first time they are submitted, which is why it's important to have an experienced attorney to represent you through the appeals process.

description:
Brooks Law Group, PA, in Lakeland, Florida, provides professional representation for personal injury, wrongful death claims and Social Security Disability Insurance (SSDI). Our law firm has been serving clients since 1992. Our practice includes handling cases for car, motorcycle and semi accidents, drunk driver accidents, defective drugs, prescription errors, Social Security appeals and veterans disability.

Our attorneys are dedicated to doing whatever it takes to resolve our clients' legal issues, whether it is a denied disability claim, accident resulting in injuries or a wrongful death. We understand the complexities of the legal system and that people often are afraid to ask for the help they really need. We handle every case by our motto: We mean business. This means we aren't going for the quick settlement of your case, particularly if it is not in your best interests. Instead we will fight for what you deserve, both in and out of the courtroom.

Founding attorney Stephen Brooks is a member of the Million Dollar Advocates Forum and has been selected as one of the Top 100 Trial Lawyers in Florida by the National Trial Lawyers Association. He has led our team toward many successful and large settlements for our clients, including recoveries of $2.5 million for the wrongful death of a child in a car accident, $1 million for the family of a man killed in a semi accident and $1 million for a passenger's death in a trucking accident.

Contact Brooks Law Group, PA, for a free initial case evaluation. We offer evening, weekend and home appointments upon request. Spanish speaking staff is available. - Se habla espa√±ol.
